## Loading and preprocessing the data

To load the data I will the function *read_csv()* from the *readr* library to read a zipped csv file.

```{r load data}
# Read  zipped CSV into r
data <- read_csv("activity.zip", col_names = TRUE)

dim(data)
summary(data)
```
